title: AEP Hygiene Operation Request
description: AEP Data Hygiene operations that instruct AEP to delete or modify records in a specified dataset and sandbox.

xdm:batchTime.title: Time the batch was created
xdm:batchTime.description: Time the hygiene batch was created

xdm:action.title: Name of the hygiene operation to be applied by downstream consumers
xdm:action.description: Name of the hygiene operation to be applied by downstream consumers.

meta:enum.privacyDelete: Identity Delete Request Inititiated by Privacy Service
meta:enum.privacyAccess: Data Access Request Inititiated by Privacy Service

xdm:targetDatasetID.title: ID(s) of the dataset(s) to which the hygiene operations apply
xdm:targetDatasetID.description: May be "ALL", but only if operationType = "deleteIdentity". Otherwise, a comma-separated list of datasetID's is required.

xdm:workorderID.title: Work Order ID for tracking purposes.
xdm:workorderID.description: Each row in a batch will be produced by a different customer REST API request, and will therefore have a different workorderID for tracking purposes.

xdm:targetServices.title: Services that should process this request.
xdm:targetServices.description: Array of service names indicating to whom these requests apply. If this field is absent, all services should process these requests.

items.title: Service Name
items.description: A service name, such as "datalake", "identity", or "profile".

xdm:operation.title: Payload of the hygiene op request
xdm:operation.description: Contents of this payload provides identities to delete, or records to update

xdm:deleteIdentity.title: Specifies rows to delete for matching identities
xdm:deleteIdentity.description: Specifies rows to delete for matching identities

xdm:namespace.title: The identity namespace
xdm:namespace.description: The namespace associated with the xdm:id attribute.

xdm:privacyDelete.title: Privacy Delete Request
xdm:privacyDelete.description: Represents data-subject requests to have their data deleted

xdm:identities.title: Set of identities
xdm:identities.description: Set of identities whose data must be deleted

xdm:namespace.title: The identity namespace
xdm:namespace.description: The namespace associated with the xdm:id attribute.

xdm:ID.title: Identifier
xdm:ID.description: An identifier belonging to the namespace

xdm:jobID.title: Privacy Service Job ID for tracking purposes.
xdm:jobID.description: An identifier assigned by Privacy Service for the purpose of tracking and reporting of customer requests.

xdm:dataSets.title: Applicable Datasets
xdm:dataSets.description: Datasets that might contain this identity

xdm:searchFields.title: Search Fields
xdm:searchFields.description: Fields of the dataset that store values of the target namespace

xdm:fieldName.title: Field Name

xdm:values.title: Search Values
